title: TIL total mastery points gained in a match is highly affected by how well my team does.
body:
When you hover on the mastery circle, it shows how many points you contributed to everyone's Champion Points this game.. I think.

Everyone in the team gets the same amount of points, some players contribute more to the total score by getting high grades like A+.

Your mastery score is more dependent on winning and how your team does than it is on you and your personal grade.

replies.body: Nope. Had a 1 hour match in ranked being 2/9/35 as sion and got an A.

I'm not talking about your grade here.

I'm talking about the total points you gain.
I don't know this for a fact, but I think the group points are simply dependent on length of the match and if you won or lost.
